sen.e: Although it is generally understood that the main members of Jingikan in the Meiji era were Japanese classical scholars infuenced by Atsutane Hirata, it was before Jingikan was restored actually that they participated in the movement actively, and it was Japanese classical scholars influenced by Takamasa OKUNI, such as Bisei FUKUBA, that dominated Jingikan actually after Jingikan was restored.
